scripts.start_paris_dwn: npm run build && npm run start -w @web50/paris_dwn
scripts.start_claude_dwn: npm run build && npm run start -w @web50/claude_dwn
scripts.clean_claude_dwn: rm -rf packages/claude_dwn/data packages/claude_dwn/DATASTORE packages/claude_dwn/INDEX packages/claude_dwn/EVENTLOG packages/claude_dwn/MESSAGESTORE
scripts.clean_paris_dwn: rm -rf packages/paris_dwn/data packages/paris_dwn/DATASTORE packages/paris_dwn/INDEX packages/paris_dwn/EVENTLOG packages/paris_dwn/MESSAGESTORE
scripts.clean_dwns: npm run clean_claude_dwn && npm run clean_paris_dwn
